# Checklist before PR can be merged:
- [ ] closes issue #xxxx
- [ ] is documented
- [ ] code formatted and linted with [ruff](https://docs.astral.sh/ruff/)
- [ ] type hints
- [ ] tests added or expanded
- [ ] remove output for all notebooks with changes
- [ ] example notebook (for new features)
